item.title: About
item.description:
What we do

Weekly meetings with hands-on content: penetration testing demos, malware analysis, defensive tooling, CTF practice, career workshops. We run training sessions, host guest speakers from the industry, and maintain an active Discord where the conversation continues between meetings.

Who we are

Our membership skews heavily toward practitioners—people actively working in offensive and defensive security roles. Red team is unusually well-represented here, but we’ve got blue and purple teamers, GRC folks, security engineers, and a handful of entrepreneurs building security companies.

item.title: Announcements
item.description: News, updates, and notices from the guild.

item.title: Join
item.description:
Membership gets you access to weekly meetings, our private Discord, training sessions, and the network of security professionals who make up the guild.

We’re not for everyone. If you’re looking for a casual meetup where people talk about security in the abstract, there are other options. If you want to be in a room with practitioners who are actively breaking and defending systems, and you’re ready to contribute—demos, talks, questions, answers—we’d like to meet you.

item.description:
